official_title: A joint resolution designating September 11, 1987, as "Pittsburgh Central Catholic High School Day".

summary.text: Designates September 11, 1987, the 60th anniversary of Central Catholic High School in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, as Pittsburgh Central Catholic High School Day.
